message.name: MAVIDS
message.description: Message to to interface between the surface IDS agent, and the UAV agent
message.field: Timestamp (time since system boot or Epoch time).
0: request ping from all receiving systems. If greater than 0: message is a ping response and number is the system id of the requesting system
Bitmap of information contained within message. (settings change, attack, response)
Default mitigation action when attack is detected
Time until default mitigation action is initiated (seconds)
Time until returning to previous flight mode (if 0, UAV will not continue mission after mitigation action is completed)
Bitmap of attack modules to enable.
